EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Station at position(0,0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions(0,0) and (2,0) for smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,-1.5) feeding iron ore into first furnace
- Burner inserter at position(2.5,-1.5) feeding iron ore into second furnace
Both furnaces have coal fuel and are currently idle waiting for iron ore input.

### Automated Coal Mining Station at position(41,-82)
An automated coal mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at position(41,-82) mining coal
- Wooden chest at position(41.5,-80.5) collecting mined coal
- Burner inserter at position(41.5,-79.5) oriented upward
The system is operational with the drill actively mining coal and storing it in the chest.

### Iron Ore Mining Station at position(-18,-53)
An automated iron ore mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18,-53) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at position(-17.5,-51.5) collecting mined iron ore
The system is operational with the drill actively mining iron ore.

### Transport Belt Network
Multiple belt groups connecting the iron ore mining station towards the smelting area:
- Belt group from (-17.5,-51.5) to (-13.5,-44.5)
- Belt group from (-17.5,-50.5) to (-12.5,-46.5)
- Belt group from (-16.5,-51.5) to (-10.5,-47.5)
- Belt group from (-9.5,-49.5) to (-7.5,-44.5)
- Belt group from (-6.5,-46.5) to (-5.5,-42.5)
- Belt group from (-4.5,-42.5) to (-5.5,-36.5)
- Belt group from (-4.5,-36.5) to (-4.5,-30.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Collisions
- When placing inserters next to furnaces, ensure proper spacing and consider the furnace dimensions
- Use appropriate spacing parameters when using place_entity_next_to function to avoid collisions with existing structures

### Resource Management
- Maintain sufficient iron plates in inventory before attempting to craft items requiring them
- Keep track of coal levels and refuel machines before they run out
- Ensure you have transport belts in inventory before attempting to connect entities with belts

### Crafting System Understanding
- For items requiring machine crafting or smelting (like iron plates), ensure they are produced in appropriate facilities first
- Plan crafting sequences to maintain required ingredients for multi-step crafting processes

### Belt Connection Issues
- Verify you have enough transport belts in inventory before attempting to create belt connections
- When connecting distant entities with belts, calculate the total belt requirement beforehand

### Entity Configuration
- When setting up automated systems, verify correct orientation of inserters and other directional entities
- Consider the input/output positions of entities when designing automated systems
